pgc++   -acc -mp -gpu=cuda11.4 -acc -mp -gpu=cuda11.4   CMakeFiles/cuda_PartB.dir/__/utils.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cuda_PartB.dir/cuda_PartB_generated_cuda_PartB.cu.o CMakeFiles/cuda_PartB.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -o cuda_PartB  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.7/cuda/11.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.7/cuda/11.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib -ljpeg /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.7/cuda/11.4/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib64/librt.so -lcudart -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
